doc:
Marc Warren https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marc_Warren 0 Marc Warren (born 20 March 1967) is an English actor, known for his British television roles. His roles have included Albert Blithe in Band of Brothers, Danny Blue in Hustle, Dougie Raymond in The Vice, Dominic Foy in State of Play, Elton Pope in Doctor Who , Rick in Mad Dogs, the Comte de Rochefort in The Musketeers and the Gentleman in Jonathan Strange Mr Norrell. Marc_Warren ( born_20_March_1967 ) is an_English_actor , known for his_British_television_roles . His_roles have_included Albert_Blithe in Band of Brothers , Danny_Blue in Hustle , Dougie_Raymond in The_Vice , Dominic_Foy in State of Play , Elton_Pope in Doctor Who , Rick in Mad_Dogs , the_Comte de Rochefort in The_Musketeers and the_Gentleman in Jonathan_Strange_ .
